cac:PostalAddress.cbc:StreetName: Oak House, Millennium Park Naas Co. Kildare

cac:SpecificTendererRequirement.cbc:Description: Refer to the ESPD in the Tender Documents

cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Name: Open Competition for National Drawdown Framework Agreement for the Supply of Infusion Consumable Products
cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Description: The Health Service Executive (HSE) wishes to invite tender responses from suppliers, who wish to participate in a National Drawdown Framework Contract Agreement (hereafter ‘the Agreement’) for the supply, delivery and product support of Infusion Consumable Products to HSE locations nationally, organisations funded by the HSE and other publicly funded agencies as per the scope of this document.
